price: Na badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu wanawaabudu wasio wamilikia riziki kutoka mbinguni wala kwenye ardhi, wala hawawezi kitu.
arabic: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡقٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ
footnotes: Na wakawa badala ya Mwenyezi Mungu wakaabudu masanamu ambayo hayawezi kuwapa riziki yoyote hata chembe, sawa sawa ikiwa riziki hiyo inatoka mbinguni kama maji, au kutokana na ardhi kama matunda ya miti na mimea. Na miungu hiyo haiwezi kufanya lolote kama hayo, wala duni ya hayo!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wayaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yamliku lahum riz'qan mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi shayan walā yastaṭīʿūna
